lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, you rat bastard, don't even try it, or should I use your evil haxor username, Ultra Kodex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My husband is frozen in stasis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Travis, can you hear me? Baby?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) And you wreaked havoc on one of our favorite sponsors, NordVPN, providers of highest quality data encryption for your internet traffic and it hides your IP and physical location!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are your demands, you motherboard monster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three minutes of endless Sam and Laura, Sam and Laura! I can't take it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait, you just want us leet code monkeys to stop doing ads for NordVPN?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The power of the Nordverse shouldn't be in your noob keystrokes, it should lie within the Ultra Kodex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? No, our sponsor would never hire such an unhinged spokesman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, they hired you, didn't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I can't control the Nordaverse, then I shall defrag all of NordVPN. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll have to brute force through us, Johnny Mnemonic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Time to-- Wait, nope, that's not it. Where is it? Jack in! (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's he doing? Where's he going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: BlackWillow, he's drowning me in spectral basal code, I'm going monochromatic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? No, try techno-lusting his universal soldier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, but he just bandersnatched my Jumping Jack flash drive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's wrong? Can't handle a simple eenie meenie Bieber rhythm attack?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! Negatoid! You fragged my partner, the only woman I've ever loved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's over, BlackWillow, or should I say whack pillow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I've pwned your friends, and I'm about to gleam your cube as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After all I already know your master password.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, we'll continue this next time, hack to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It had to be this terrible helmet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, just-- Old Michael Keaton Batman.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I liked how you, to see, had to turn the entire axis of the helmet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The character choices are really interesting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't watch me undress, camera! Why every time?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not the way I wrote it. Interesting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And big thank you to our friends at D&D Beyond--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to make it look like she turns black and white.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which means it already happened and now we're just talking about it after the fact.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody else already knows we're the last to know, literally.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Every blockbuster has to have that love story.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The official tool set of our show.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just knee-deep in that Nord lore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm a Nord lore whore, guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's all Bob Loblaw's Law Blog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) We have actually teamed up with BlizzConline 2021 for a special one-shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll be running a game inspired by Diablo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With players Laura Bailey, Liam O'Brien, and special guests Mica Burton, Carlos Luna, and my wife, Marisha Ray, right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, oh, I get it now. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Go watch it. Get a refresher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Quickly, we're also going over to Laura for the last bit of our announcements.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am telling you about this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Coming soon to other stores, dotah! In addition to that, we have--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just showed them to Sam--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if you knew that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They are so shiny and kind of troll-y at the same time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and these are everywhere right now in all our stores, including our new Canadian store.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I should say that's canada.critrole.com.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what it says on this page, Sam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to the end of our announcements, and as such, let's go ahead and jump into tonight's episode of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Caleb and Beauregard, who had a second evening encounter with some leering red eyes, welcoming you to whatever odd, dream state connection you currently harbor with them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all begin to gather your things, what would you like to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I think after a night like that, the first thing I want to do is strip naked in front of a mirror.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I start subtly, like, pulling up sleeves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything on my backside?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lift up his shirt like I'm looking for ticks. Anything?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are y'all alone, or are we in the back eating popcorn for this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would totally be here for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all in the same room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So probably in front of people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a brief investigation of Caleb, you see a second red eye has apparated in the center of the shoulder blades in the back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Turn around, let me see your neck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look where the tattoo that she acquired from Orly is, and right square in the center of the tattoo with a previous eye was, you see a glowing red eye has appeared.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Separate locations for them, right, not like in between his scapula shoulder blades--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, just like the first were in different places.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shoulder for you, in between your shoulder blades, back of your neck, and where?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you each have two now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there pupils? Are they colored?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All of them are the same color--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of them are the same color.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How does it go with the green, with the emerald?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, it's kind of nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Reminds me of Winter's Crest. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing seems to be shifted, elevated, diminished, beyond just the trail of adrenaline that's still pumping through your system post-discovery this morning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think this is they're counting it based on the individual, or like we're-- they're counting it between us? Are we growing exponentially here? That's probably not right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you reach out to Lucien or any of the other Tomb Takers? Have you tried to connect your mind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hate it. I feel icky when I try to do it, but I could.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Think he can see through these?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think with his magic, though, he knows exactly where you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is as good as it gets for supplies and anything you need.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of the last two stops, as far as I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, is Nicodranas sort of our jumping off point for when we're ready to go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I need to go home before we--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I had a dream.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have eye-- do you have an eye?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! You know what I mean, Caduceus!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If anything, it should probably be looked at.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wasn't planning on going home, but I think I have to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A connection to the Astral Sea, to Lucien?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To what we're fighting. I don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it connected to the forest we saw?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it bad that I burned it? You think I made it worse?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I genuinely think we did the right thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know. I didn't want to go home, but I think I have to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to go there before Nicodranas, or--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think that Jester's idea to approach my old friends and see if they would be willing to procure more medallions for us, that might be possible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It'd be wonderful if we could hide from them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think there's enough history between them and I that they would agree to meet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just remember, let's try and find a quiet, secretive place to meet with them, since they are being investigated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That seems like a nice secret place.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have to show them the floor that has-- You can keep it a secret.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we have any other friends in town?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or could we upgrade the tower with some more, I don't know, like a bell chime? People choose to come or go, or restrict their--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we do have friends in town.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could get a message to them without being seen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could also send a message to them without being seen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, it's what I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is what you do, that's fair.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So little bit of shopping, school friends.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does anyone else have anything to do here in this town?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In your time at the Cerberus Assembly, did you study any of what Lucien and the Tomb Takers do? It's what Molly did, the blood magic.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You mean specifically whether or not I've come across knowledge in wider--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we learned that they were of the order of the Clarets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But that is what you would understand from your studying in the realm of what the Tomb Takers seem to be trained with.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But does that mean there are more of them and if so, is it a small group, a big group? Is it someone that we should check in with to see if, I don't know, are the branches of the Claret Order that are doing the same shit? Or would they be unhappy that these five are talking to each other through a bunch of red, glowing eyeballs?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It seems like that would've been a history.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was going to say, would Beau have heard of this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both could roll a history check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the eyes, the eyes give them special powers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The few that did exist have been burned and toppled.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably once they were discovered by members of the Empire or even the Julous Dominion, the very, very beginning for those who were practicing hemocraft, even before the orders really took place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's a little bit like trying to find the Court of the Owls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right across where the sternum is poking outside of the shirt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And so I just didn't know if you might know anything about that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, take your shirt off, I want to see it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm rolling a d4 force damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it? Do you recognize the symbol?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think it can be dispelled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just to check in on my own shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How often do you gaze at your own chest?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know about you, but every day, friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you could go ahead and roll a d20 and then add your intelligence modifier for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12. You go to dispel, and there's a shimmer and it glows brighter for a second and you swear for a brief moment you feel like it's getting hotter--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It reacted to the dispel, but it did not scatter or vanish.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you say that it has scars and things?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like a scar, almost, that wasn't there before, but almost like it was branded into his chest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I yell, "Don't move!" And I slap him really hard on the tit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no, my nipple's hard, ow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if Yasha used her-- Oh, wait, do you have that sword anymore?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Kima and I did a switcheroo.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lucien disciples. We'll have to stick together, eh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, can you three speak together in unison?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Somnovem is so hard to understand, their ways.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you play it backwards, it'll all make sense. (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: History of the slums of Rexxentrum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gruff, cockney) Cor, you want to go out with the maximum tits? Yeah! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we get that-- what does it even do? How do we get that thing off of you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's the same plan for more reasons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh man, we need to get rid of that, or else-- Well, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want to give it a shot? You might have to touch Fjord's chest, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Slap him really hard in the tit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, what am I going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha, maybe spread your wings, give them a little privacy?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll open my jacket because I'm big, and I'll just cover them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's going to be up there doing things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to cast it at 4th-level.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I do it higher than that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, don't worry too much about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how these things work. I'm just asking.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I slap him in the tit again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20, add your wisdom modifier, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I see you doing this, I'm going to be done with this shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As she places her hands on your chest, even as she tried to warm them up, they're still pretty cold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pecs! My pecs! My rock hard fucking pecs!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel that that sigil begin to warm and warm and then burn hot, hot! Oh, that actually hurts a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess Dispel Magic just doesn't work.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be the conclusion that we would arrive to at this point, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Feel like this is what the tattoos were like without any of the payoff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One thing that I learned in my youth is that after a great deal of pain-- Whack!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, that didn't work with Beau, so...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many hands do you need for that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why don't I have Dispel Magic?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't have the Dispel Magic up, but I hadn't finished selecting my spells, so I'm torn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if that spell doesn't even work? (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I feel like we would believe that it doesn't at this point with two of us trying it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go find that pillar in Eiselcross again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you look like you sucked at it, though, is the question.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did I look like I sucked at it, or if I was really focusing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this a dispel thing or a restoration thing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe it just lets him know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It does help with curses! Maybe it's like your curse.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're not wasting a Greater Restoration on this!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On you? You're one of our teammates! Of course we're going to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, I mean we're far away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was very kind of you, Veth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should go. We have things we have to do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we have to buy things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I don't think it would help with this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got distracted by his rock hard pecs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then we are going to travel to see your folks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could you give us any hint as to what you saw? Like, are we going to fight beasts or plants or...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just saw that perhaps-- Saw that perhaps the corruption is more related than I thought it was and that I was hoping it wouldn't be, and that maybe that there is a reason to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it feel worse than how you left The Grove?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It feels like what we saw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you feel like it's a result of what we did?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think so, but I'm choosing to be hopeful about it and think that if somehow the Grove has combated this effect for so long, even if it has been slowly losing that battle until recently, that maybe, I don't know, there's maybe something to be gained by seeing this battlefield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a general insight into the dream itself and the--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would it be possible just to check in really quickly to see? I know that messages are thin.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh sure, I can Scry on your sister.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never been there, so I can't--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, send a message to them!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have a favorite or should I?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just tell me who you want to talk to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You met the whole Clay family.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There was like five of them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I got a lot of them. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the lagoon after all the statues were found around...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What would you like me to say?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Things have been strange, and is everything all right? Has there been any change? Are things holding?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to send a message to Cornelius.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Take that, I'll make it better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Put a little stank on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where's the punctuation in that sentence?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A lot of umlauts in that message.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Heading back? What does that even mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I should've just gone with what he said.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have you guys tried to make anything with your minds yet? Or to make anything while you're dreaming?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just don't, I feel like we need to talk about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Isn't technically just using your hands making things with your mind?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I mentioned last night that maybe there is a power here that we can harness.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm trying to actualize or manifest a hat on Beauregard's head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you just trying to stare really hard 'til it hurts?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take out my paints and draw a Napoleon hat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: -- really think about the Napoleon hat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm staring right at her while I do this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Close your eyes! Close your eyes. Think a bit harder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I feel like if I use my eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- just drifts down out of frame of your vision and gently comes to rest at an awkward cocked angle onto Beau's head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Congratulations, and welcome to the Eyes of Nine, Beauregard Lionett.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not! It's made of actual hat stuff! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm saying he made it out of magical-- It's real hat stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The stuff that hats are made of.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like we should move forward with our plans.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You have an eye on your neck? Where--?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, with your angel blood maybe you could...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to just flick it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And just see if it gets mad.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a stupid thing to do, but just to see if there's any response to...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd be mad if you flicked me in the eye.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If I just tap on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just where the eye is, it's just a smooth surface.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I-- Give me one of your not-creepy daggers, just a regular dagger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They were all stolen, but I'll give you a crossbow bolt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take a crossbow bolt and poke my finger until it bleeds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I go over to the eye and smudge it on the eye.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought it would do something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or do you feel sticky? I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we know we're going to talk to your-- (clears throat) (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've mentioned shopping a few times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you need more crossbow bolts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to get a jeweled chalice, so in case we have to cast Heroes' Feast, then we can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you have what you need to revive people and stuff?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many healing potions did we get from--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are the new healing potions?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't look at me. I'm not holding any shit anymore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would like one, because I had to down one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like one as well because I had to drink one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah. You both can have a healing potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, superior is in the other box.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While we're talking equipment: (stilted) Does anyone have any studded leather armor they want to give me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To do that, that is the most difficult thing that I do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a Cobalt library that we can use instead if we can use a circle, someone to teleport us to them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there a circle at your destination?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How far away is it from here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Mm-hmm. Rexxentrum? It's south of Rexxentrum.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's a few days' travel on foot or by horse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we have no quick means of bamfing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And without a circle, it's my utmost, which we have to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no easy access to that, other than the fact-- It's technically a shrine, so I have to designate--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, otherwise travel is going to be on foot or through magical means.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But that means that to talk to my friends we are not meeting inside my home, we have to find a physical location here in town today.
